story.text: Steve Adolph consultant with WSA Consulting Ltd. and is based in Vancouver B.C. Prior to joining WSA, Steve worked on a wide range of software development projects from call processing for GTD5, network management, to automated railway signalling.
Steve's professional interests are in improving the software development process.
Steve's non professional interests include skiing, the opera, and hockey (although this year all his favourite hockey teams - the [[Vancouver Canucks]][1] and [[Montreal Canadiens]] - really stink ).
I have been collaborating with three friends on a [[Use Case Patterns Book]]
Steve can be reached at mailto:wsa@bc.sympatico.ca
